application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
description: Submission of details pursuant to Condition 29.4 (Internal Noise Standards) in respect of Plot 12 within Reserved Matters Application approval (LPA reference: 17/6662/RMA dated 28 February 2018 as amended by 20/0362/NMA dated 7 February 2020, 20/1174/NMA dated 4 September 2020, 20/5694/NMA dated 1 April 2021, 21/5981/NMA dated 10 August 2022, 23/2212/NMA dated 4 August 2023 and 23/5028/NMA dated 19 January 2024) falling within Phase 1B (South) of planning permission F/04687/13 dated 23/07/14 for the comprehensive redevelopment of Brent Cross Cricklewood. This discharge relates to Plot 12 (South) only.
